oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This seems to be a holograph copy dated 20 Muḥarram 1174 AH [August 31, 1760 AD].
The book was apparently bound with Kitāb Alfāẓ al-kufr ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Shāfīʻī [MS Arab 7141].
MS Arab SM7019. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
